sent.orig: Individually, blend the coconut flesh, mango flesh and dragon fruit flesh in a grinder, until smooth.
sent.trans: 把椰子肉、芒果肉、龙珠果肉各别放进搅碎机里搅拌成细滑果酱。

sent.orig: Therefore, brethren, we are debtors-not to the flesh, to live according to the flesh.
sent.trans: 12弟兄们，这样看来，我们并不是欠肉体的债去顺从肉体活著。

sent.orig: Ox flesh price compares cow flesh every kilogram tower above 2 yuan above.
sent.trans: 公牛肉价比母牛肉每千克又高出2元以上。

sent.orig: The sensitive flesh must choose the product which discretely these mark sensitive flesh may use.
sent.trans: 敏感型肌肤也要谨慎挑选那些标明敏感肌肤可以使用的产品。

sent.orig: Side flesh is peddled by day cut the flesh, work to the hospital in the evening.
sent.trans: 白天帮肉贩割肉，晚上则到医院工作。
